items.abstract: There is a growing interest in the use of nanosystems in biomedical applications. In this perspective, we survey current applications and advances in magnetic nanoparticles used in biomedical applications, so as to understand the material properties that can pave the way for the use of nanoalloys.
title: Nanosystems: the use of nanoalloys, metallic, bimetallic, and magnetic nanoparticles in biomedical applications
